text: Inu simudzatha kuchita chilungamo pakati pa akazi anu ngakhale mutafuna kutero. Motero musakondere mbali imodzi ndikumusiya winayo osadziwa chimene chili kuchitika. Ndipo ngati inu muchita chilungamo ndi kuchita chili chonse chabwino ndi kuopa Mulungu, ndithudi Mulungu ndi wokhululukira ndi wachisoni chosatha
